name: Shattered Between
storyline: At the beginning of the game, you choose an augmentation - the starting ability of the hero, which you will further develop. Time dilation, universal gravity, and so on will all be available to you. Find a combination of augmentation and weapons that fit your style of play!
summary: A dynamic roguelike shooter, where you can experiment with weapons and special abilities, wander through various rooms-worlds and defeat opponents! Will you pass the tests and reach the final goal?
